Html:
Is there, or can there be, an option to minify the JavaScript that is generated. I don't know if that would mean two .js files (unminified, like today, and a .min. version--each with it's own .map file), or if it will be generated straight to a minified version.

I suppose if I never need to look at the JavaScript that is being generated, going straight to minified would be fine.

Not yet. It's been requested several times though.

https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/1542

https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/157
